item.title: Digital Systems Work
item.author: fabianmolina@stanford.edu (Fabian Molina)
item.description: FPGA-Based Music Player with Waveform Display Project Description: In my Digital System Design course, I developed a music player on an FPGA using Verilog, building modules that read and played notes stored in ROM.
